articles.author: Dan Horn
articles.title: A long haul with long COVID: Why poor and middle income Americans are hit hardest - The Cincinnati Enquirer
articles.description: Long COVID can strike anyone, rich or poor, but a growing body of evidence suggests poor and middle income Americans like Rick Henline suffer most.
articles.content: After COVID-19 left him gasping for breath in a hospital bed, after his kidneys failed and his lungs filled with fluid and his heart almost gave out, Rick Henline set what he believed were some reali… [+12788 chars]
